00027     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Sound_Decoder> DecoderPtr;

00030     enum PlayMode {
00031         Play_Normal  = 0, /* tracked, non-looping, multi-instance, environment */
00032         Play_Loop    = 1<<0, /* Sound will continually loop until explicitly stopped */
00033         Play_NoEnv   = 1<<1, /* Do not apply environment effects (eg, underwater filters) */
00034         Play_NoTrack = 1<<2, /* (3D only) Play the sound at the given object's position
00035                               * but do not keep it updated (the sound will not move with
00036                               * the object and will not stop when the object is deleted. */
00037     };
00038     static inline int operator|(const PlayMode &a, const PlayMode &b)
00039     { return (int)a | (int)b; }
00040     static inline int operator&(const PlayMode &a, const PlayMode &b)
00041     { return (int)a & (int)b; }
00042 
00043     enum Environment {
00044         Env_Normal,
00045         Env_Underwater,
00046     };
